title-group.article-title: Der französische Protestantismus: Positionen im politischen und gesellschaftlichen Bereich

abstract.p: The article reveals, that even though the French Protestants form less than two percent of the French population they have had a considerable impact on French public discourse for example in matters like the reconciliation of France and Germany after 1945, the rebuilding of Europe, pacifism and nuclear disarmament, the relationship between church and state, and sexual ethics.
